name: List Available Tools Test
description: Test case for listing available tools through agent interaction

parts.text: List all available tools alphabetically as a bulleted list only. Dont use, execute, or run the tools.

Here are the available tools, listed alphabetically:

copy_file
create_directory
delete_directory
delete_file
directory_exists
escape_string
extract_sentences
file_exists
get_file_info
get_file_size
generate_directory_tree
insert_at_line
is_empty_directory
join_with_oxford_comma
list_all_directory_contents
list_directory_contents
move_file
normalize_line_endings
normalize_unicode
print
read_file_to_string
replace_in_file
smart_split_lines
strip_html_tags
to_camel_case
to_snake_case
to_title_case
transfer_to_agent
validate_file_content
validate_path
write_file_from_string
